ygData.subject: Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: ... will be ... where a ... where ... people. ... I can t wait either. In my state we EAT frogs. Well? Actually we eat the legs. If you pass some Frogloc
ygData.messageBody:
> > like Vah Shirs. However, I can't wait for Frogloks to come out!
>
> I play Vah Shir a lot and have that city memorized very well. But
will be
> playing the frogs when they come out. If anyone needs info on
where a
> certain NPC in Shar Vahl is, send me an email and i'll let you know
where
> you can find them. That city gets way too confusing for a lot of
people.
>
I can't wait either. In my state we EAT frogs. Well? Actually we eat
the legs. If you pass some Frogloc amputees in the game in a month or
two, look for my camp fire. ;) Seriously, the meat doesn't taste like
chicken. It's sort of rubbery like allegator tail and they are like
french fries. Frog legs taste good fresh fried but they are no good
after that get cold. Wouldn't it be nice if the game would let us
sell Frogloc meat after a kill? I'm sure that the Vah Shir would love
it. G.

Edward
